body.name: BLACK+DECKER 4-Slice Crisp 'N Bake Air Fry Toaster Oven, TO1787SS, 5 Cooking Functions, 30 Minute Timer, Stainless Steel
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 21 - 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Air Fry Technology - Deep fried taste without the fat! This innovative cooking method surrounds food with high intensity hot air to bake, brown, and crisp your favorite fried food using little to no oil.
Two Control Knobs - Simple controls for the 30-minute timer and for selecting the cooking functions.
Even Toast Technology - More even toasting with the unique heat diffuser design. It evenly distributes heat and infrared energy throughout the oven to optimize even toasting.
Five Cooking Functions - Choose from Air Fry, Bake, Broil, Toast, and Keep Warm.
Cooking Capacity - This countertop toaster oven fits a 9” pizza, 4 slices of bread, or a variety of other snacks and meals.
body.description: Deep fried taste without the fat! This oven features Air Fry Technology, which uses high intensity hot air to bake, brown, and crisp your favorite fried foods with little to no oil. The included air fry mesh tray allows hot air to surround food for fast, crisp results. Two control knobs simplify cooking, letting you set the 30-minute timer and choose from five cooking functions: Air Fry, Bake, Broil, Toast, and Keep Warm. On the toasting function, Even Toast Technology™ evenly distributes heat and infrared energy to optimize even toasting. The interior is large enough to fit up to 4 slices of bread or a 9” pizza, and it’s great for fresh or frozen snacks. Innovative features and reliable performance help make BLACK+DECKER the #1 brand in toaster ovens*. We stand behind our appliances with a 2-year limited warranty so you and your family can depend on them in your kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This toaster oven is a very good deal for what you get
reviews.reviewText: I am impressed with this B&D Crisp & Bake toaster oven. It is definitely an improvement over the very similar model that I bought 2 years ago for a higher price that did not have the air-fryer feature. The controls are easier to use and to read and the air fryer seems to work well and is a nice addition to this oven. I haven't used it enough to discuss cleaning or how durable it is. My only complaint, just like my last B&D oven is that it doesn't toast evenly. The top of toast gets darker than the bottom of the toast. My previous model was tough to clean once it got dirty, so it might be true of this oven, too. I haven't used it enough for it to need cleaning yet. However, I am really happy with the Black and Decker 4-Slice Crisp 'N Bake Air Fry Toaster Oven otherwise and I can recommend it, especially considering its low price, compared with other toaster ovens with similar features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This thing cooks very well for one person. Great product for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I can't believe it was only $39. Works great. Nice chrome finish. Perfect size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and simple, and gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: Reasons for a 4 star rating:a) I found no Cancel function on the device so you get stuck (or increase) initial dial up for the heat time.b) Owen ceiling is low and prevents you from heating/air-frying any items thicker than two inches or so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Incinerates toast on MED. Long knobs means you can't see all dial markings without crouching.
reviews.reviewText: PRO: It toasts evenly. Your charcoal briquette will be evenly black.I'm at the age where I usually don't need glasses for much but reading certain text. Microwave dinners that print unnecessarily small text on a colored background, stuff like that. But for appliances: microwave, range, dishwasher, washer and dryer, I don't need them at all -- all mainstream products, no "vision impaired" versions here.But this toaster oven has small, skinny black text on stainless. So I first have to get my glasses, then crouch down directly in front of it to see the entire dial. OK, so I'm a fossil, but still, the knobs protrude so far, that if it's on a countertop, you can't see the lower part of the dial without crouching. (If you use it at eye-level, it's not a problem.) The air-fry setting is incomprehensibly a printed gray box with the text cut out to show stainless letters, where there's nearly zero contrast between the box and stainless. It's like inviso-text!For toast, it requires you to turn the timer past 10, then back to the toast setting, and although there are indicators of desired toastiness, they have no correlation to the end result. Anything but nearly white will burn, and there's so little of a knob-twist between burned and hot bread that it's impossible to get consistent results. You just have to stand and watch and pull it out when it's what you want. Which is a pity, because it toasts more evenly than any other toaster oven I've used. OTOH, it also seems to get hotter on the outside than some others.This is yet another product seemingly designed by kids (*shakes fist*) with perfect vision, who've neither taken an industrial design course, nor actually used a product of this type; Needless to say, it's look real cool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheaply made and poor quality
reviews.reviewText: It is not stainless steel. The oven front turn brown on the 1st use to broil (not even frier). The baking pan is not stainless steel either. It was burned and turned black on the 1st use. The burned oil on the pan does not come off. I wish I can return, but I used it unfortunately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this thing very convenient, it has the different settings for your liking 💯

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great oven for the money
reviews.reviewText: The Black and Decker brand has been a mainstay with me for decades.I've had very few quality issues and durability has always been a non issue.
